Sentence: Eddie and Martin talk, and Eddie reveals that he (Eddie) is May's half-sister and that they ", "``fooled around''  (Mayhalf-sister)', 'in high school before they knew of their blood relationship
Eddie tells Martin about the day he (Eddie) found about his (Eddie) father's secret life with May's mother
May is angry because Eddie told his (Eddie) side of the story to Martin
There is an explosion and Martin looks out the window and tells them that Eddie's horse trailer is ablaze and the horses have been let loose
May packs her (Countess) suitcase and tells Martin that Eddie is gone
